TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SecurityException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 偵測到安全性錯誤時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a security error is detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A呼叫端沒有存取資源所需的權限時，會擲回例外狀況。A exception is thrown when a caller does not have the permissions required to access a resource. 下列範例會具現化物件，其中包含物件，以允許存取 UI 物件與剪貼簿和物件以防止存取登錄。The following example instantiates a object that includes a object to allow access to UI objects and the Clipboard and a object to prevent registry access. 若要呼叫方法可讓您表示不論指派給呼叫者的權限將套用這些權限。The call to the method means that these permissions will apply regardless of the permissions assigned to the caller. 如此一來，嘗試建立登錄機碼會擲回。As a result, the attempt to create a registry key throws a . [!code-csharp[System.SecurityException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.securityexception.class/cs/se_ex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.SecurityException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.securityexception.class/vb/se_ex1.vb#1)] 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_SECURITY，其值 0x8013150A。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_SECURITY, which has the value 0x8013150A. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單類別，請參閱特定建構函式。For a list of the initial property values for an instance of the class, see a specific constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 這個建構函式會設定下列屬性值中的資訊為基礎`info`參數：This constructor sets the following property values based on the information in the `info` parameter: - - - - - - - - - - ## Examples 如需使用的範例建構函式，針對提供的範例，請參閱建構函式。For an example of the use of a constructor, see the example provided for the constructor.

param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.| ## Examples 如需使用的範例建構函式，針對提供的範例，請參閱建構函式。For an example of the use of a constructor, see the example provided for the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction Action { System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定造成例外狀況的安全性動作。

span.span: Gets or sets the security action that caused the exception.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含造成安全性檢查失敗的安全性動作。The property contains the security action that caused the security check failure. 許多的安全性動作可能會導致擲回安全性例外狀況。Many of the security actions can cause a security exception to be thrown. 例如，權限的需求設定檢查呼叫堆疊上的所有呼叫端具有必要的權限，在權限集合。For example, a demand on a permission set checks that all callers on the call stack have the necessary permissions in the permission set. 如果呼叫堆疊上的任何呼叫端沒有必要的權限，則安全性檢查會失敗。If any caller on the call stack lacks a required permission, the security check fails. 或者，在呼叫鏈結中的方法時，可以加上堆疊查核行程修飾詞，例如修改結果的堆疊查核行程或，以限制允許的權限在堆疊上。Alternatively, a method in the call chain can modify the outcome of the stack walk by placing a stack walk modifier, such as or , on the stack to limit the allowed permissions. 比方說，在呼叫堆疊上的方法可能全部拒絕其呼叫端的一組權限名為 PSET1，使得屬於 PSET1 使用權限的任何要求失敗的呼叫端。For example, a method on the call stack might deny all of its callers a set of permissions named PSET1, such that any demand for a permission that is part of PSET1 fails for those callers. 屬性包含導致擲回的例外狀況的安全性動作。The property contains the security action that caused the exception to be thrown. 會在列舉型別命名空間提供的安全性動作值屬性。 is an enumeration in the namespace that provides the security action value for the property. 通常這個屬性會包含其中一個下表中顯示的值。Typically this property contains one of the values shown in the following table. |安全性動作Security action|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||完整堆疊查核行程無法對所識別的組件所提出的要求因為屬性。A full stack walk failed due to a demand made against the assembly identified by the property.| ||針對所識別的組件的連結要求屬性失敗。A link demand against the assembly identified by the property failed.| ||所識別的組件屬性無法符合繼承要求。An assembly identified by the property failed to meet an inheritance demand.| ||要求的權限不符合任何權限權限集合。A demanded permission did not match any permission in the permission set. 方法放的呼叫堆疊由屬性。The method that placed the on the call stack is identified by the property.| ||要求的權限比對中設定的呼叫堆疊上的拒絕權限的權限。A demanded permission matched a permission in the deny permission set on the call stack. 方法放的呼叫堆疊由屬性。The method that placed the on the call stack is identified by the property.|

summary.span: 取得或設定失敗之要求的安全性權限、權限集或權限集集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the demanded security permission, permission set, or permission set collection that failed.

value.span: 權限、權限集或權限集集合物件。

span.span: A permission, permission set, or permission set collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳回的權限集或權限集集合，傳回的物件包含的所有要求的權限，一或多個這造成失敗。In the case of a returned permission set or permission set collection, the returned object contains all the demanded permissions, one or more of which caused the failure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性來顯示要求的安全性權限、 權限集或權限設定失敗的集合。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the demanded security permission, permission set, or permission set collection that failed. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含拒絕的權限、 權限集合或造成安全性檢查失敗的權限集集合。This property contains the denied permission, permission set, or permission set collection that caused the security check to fail. 它是`null`不是 Deny 所造成的例外狀況。It is `null` for exceptions that are not caused by a Deny. 屬性的類型是因為它可以包含的權限，設定權限，或權限集集合。The property is of type because it can contain a permission, a permission set, or a permission set collection. 若要測試此屬性的執行階段類型，您可以使用方法或特定語言運算子，例如 C# 中的運算子或 Visual Basic 中的運算子。To test the run-time type of this property, you can use the method or a specific language operator, such as the operator in C# or the operator in Visual Basic.

member this.FailedAssemblyInfo : System.Reflection.AssemblyName with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定失敗組件的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets information about the failed assembly.
An that identifies the failed assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含識別造成安全性檢查失敗的組件的物件。This property contains an object that identifies the assembly that caused the security check to fail. > [!NOTE] > 中的安全性例外狀況發生時，不會填入這個屬性或是堆疊框架，因為發出的組件或安全性動作不是失敗的堆疊查核行程的組件。This property is not populated when a security exception occurs in a or stack frame, because the assembly issuing the or security action is not the assembly that failed the stack walk. 在這些情況下，安全性例外狀況會透過建構函式不需要執行的組件名稱，授與設定的詳細資訊，或拒絕集資訊。In these cases, the security exception is created with a constructor that does not require an assembly name, granted set information, or refused set information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性，以顯示失敗的組件的相關資訊。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the information about the failed assembly. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CPP/form1.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CS/form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/VB/form1.vb#12)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要求失敗之權限集合或權限集集合中的第一個權限。

span.span: Gets or sets the first permission in a permission set or permission set collection that failed the demand.

value.span: 表示失敗的第一個權限的 物件。

span.span: An object representing the first permission that failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求的物件權限集合或權限集集合，表示只有第一個權限造成例外狀況。If the demanded object is a permission set or permission set collection, the represents only the first permission that caused the exception. 在集合或集合中的其他權限也可能導致要求失敗。Additional permissions in the set or collection can also cause a demand failure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetObjectData` 會使用所有指定要序列化的例外狀況物件資料來設定 。`GetObjectData` sets a with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在還原序列化期間，從在資料流上傳輸的 `SerializationInfo` 重新組成例外狀況。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the `SerializationInfo` transmitted over the stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用方法，以顯示包含的權限狀態物件。The following code shows the use of the method to display the permission state contained in the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/VB/form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 取得或設定與例外狀況關聯之方法的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the information about the method associated with the exception.
A object describing the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-instance-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-instance-note.md)] 此屬性包含下列其中一項：This property contains one of the following: - 安全性檢查觸發例外狀況發生時，正在執行失敗的組件之方法的相關資訊。Information about the method that the failed assembly was executing when the security check that triggered the exception occurred. - 放置其中一個方法的相關資訊或是安全性動作，在呼叫堆疊上，如果發生失敗，因為或。Information about the method that placed either a or security action on the call stack, in the case of a failure due to a or . - `null`要屬性來指定特定的方法是不可能發生失敗。`null`, in the case of a failure that is impossible to attribute to a specific method. 物件提供的方法名稱、 類別名稱和組件名稱資訊，可唯一識別的方法。The object provides the method name, class name, and assembly name information that uniquely identifies the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ PermitOnlySetInstance { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.PermitOnlySetInstance : obj with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定權限、權限集或權限集的集合，其屬於造成安全性檢查失敗之僅限允許的堆疊框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the permission, permission set, or permission set collection that is part of the permit-only stack frame that caused a security check to fail.

value.span: 權限、權限集或權限集集合物件。

span.span: A permission, permission set, or permission set collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示允許的權限，權限集或權限設定導致安全性例外狀況的堆疊框架中所包含的集合。The property represents the permitted permission, permission set, or permission set collection contained in the stack frame that caused the security exception. 比方說，安全性例外狀況發生時由於失敗時，允許的權限會出現在這個屬性，而且要求包含在屬性。For instance, when a security exception occurs because of a failure, the permitted permission appears in this property and the demanded is contained in the property. 此屬性的類型是因為權限、 權限集或權限集合的集合可以所有要求和是其一般基底類別。This property is of type because permissions, permission sets, or permission set collections can all be demanded and is their common base class. 若要測試此屬性的執行階段類型，您可以使用方法或特定語言運算子，例如 C# 中的運算子或 Visual Basic 中的運算子。To test the run-time type of this property, you can use the method or a specific language operator, such as the operator in C# or the operator in Visual Basic.
